content.body: Reminder: All Ecma member organizations (whether "ordinary" or another category) are welcome to join the Ecma GA starting tomorrow at 9 AM, Swiss time. DM me for a Zoom link, agenda or other meeting materials.
Be sure to either attend or send in your voting intentions form if you will be absent.
When do you think we will make the go/no-go call on this? I'd like to start planning my Sept/Oct travel.
